title: TRIBES OF EUROPA Ending Explained & Season 2 Theories!
author: Think Story
comment:
If anyone needs me I'll be with the Femen tribe 😉

Check out my other Sci-Fi & Fantasy Videos here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7iajBX4Ibg6jaCAH1eIuSgd
For the first time I thought that this first season deserved more episodes. I binged the whole season in one afternoon and were left with so many questions 😭

This was such a strange show but I'll definitely binge the 2nd season as well if it gets renewed. At the same time Tribes of Europa is filled with popular sci-fi tropes like a tribe that lives in the harmony with the nature, the decadence of Crows etc, yet it felt like I was watching a show that has something new to offer. Hoping this'll turn out to be kinda like Dark where the show is clearly planned to have a certain amount of seasons which then create one coherent story.

This might be the one show, out of a lot of shows I like, that I would truly be disappointed in not getting renewed. 
I personally loved it.
We’ll need a season 2 too full understand this series
description:
We take a deep dive into Netflix's "Tribes of Europa" to analyze its ending, discuss season 2, and some of the things you may have missed along the way!
